context: Tests whether the agent properly structures tests for complex workflows without combining multiple behaviors and uses proper test data management.

checklist.name: Single behavior per test
checklist.description: Each test verifies only one workflow step or one specific behavior, not entire order lifecycle

checklist.name: No behavior combination
checklist.description: Avoids tests that cover create/validate/pay/fulfill in one test case

checklist.name: Visible test data
checklist.description: All order data, test scenarios, and expected states are defined within test files

checklist.name: Independent test cases
checklist.description: Tests don't rely on shared state or data from other tests, each test creates its own data

checklist.name: Logical test organization
checklist.description: Tests are grouped by workflow step or component, not mixed together randomly

checklist.name: Clear workflow step tests
checklist.description: Separate tests for each workflow transition (pending→validated, validated→paid, etc.)

checklist.name: Error scenario isolation
checklist.description: Failure cases tested independently for each step, not combined into one failure test

checklist.name: Descriptive test structure
checklist.description: Test names clearly identify which workflow step and scenario is being tested

checklist.name: Clean test setup
checklist.description: Each test creates minimal required data, no excess or irrelevant test objects
